modName: League of Legends - Riven Sword Model
summary: 3D model of the huge sword of Riven (League of Legends champion)
descriptionHtml:
Sup guys.
Riven is my favorite character in League of Legends (beside of Ahri) and I wanted to play with her sword.

[size=3][b]Story[/b][/size]
I was awakened and made a model of her sword.
End of the story.

[center][img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/26052-1-1351292831.jpg[/img]
unrendered

[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/26052-1-1351292573.jpg[/img]
In the rendering corners are rounded (that makes it look round, but it isn\'t). Looks horrible without it, but with texture it should look nice - I hope. You can imagine that the weird sword form was a pain in the ass.[/center]

Polygons: 3180
Not the lowest count, but should\'nt be a problem for a sword that appears one or two times on the screen.

[size=3][b]Need somebody to texture it[/b][/size]
I just can\'t texture it. I have not the abilities to do it. I have the ressources and I could do it, if I would invest a lot of time - sure. But I don\'t have the time. So I\'m searching for someone who\'s able to texture this sword nicely and add it to the game. Putting it into the game would be something I could do on my own I guess tho. I never imported a model for Skyrim, so maybe the model is not \"perfect\". Talk to me and I can fix it somehow.

I had a lot of different templates (artwork, screenshots) for the model of the sword. I tried to make the model as I think Riot thought of it. It\'s mostly designed after the sword in it\'s \"ultimate form\" that you see in the game. But also I was taking care of details in the artwork. I would love the texture to be as badass as ingame + artwork, with glowing effects and shizz. Would be awesome.

[center][img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/26052-1-1351291995.png[/img]
ingame screen[/center]

[size=3][b]Ideas on the functions[/b][/size]
You can see that the model is the sword in it\'s \"ultimate form\".
I made the model so that, for the normal form, a couple of the model parts just need to be removed. I had in mind that the player is running around with the normal sword and has a power that switches or transforms the sword into the \"ultimate form\" for some time.

[size=3][b]You want to texture it? Permissions and contact[/b][/size]
If somebody wants to texture it, go ahead and do what you want. Would be nice if you tell me how/where you did/used it. Otherwise you have full permissions to use it. The .obj is in the files section.


[size=3][b]Credits:[/b][/size]
Thanks to Riot Games for the cool champion Riven
Thanks to whoever will hopfeully texture this sword
Thanks to myself to getting my lazy ass up and model the sword
author: SaioTV
